about_the_game:
Falldenn is a VR-only game that immerses players in a stylized medieval world. The game's main focus is realistic crafting mechanics based on real life medieval processes.

  • Realistic Survival Mechanics: Manage hunger, thirst, and fatigue to stay alive.

  • Immersive Crafting System: Gather resources, craft tools, weapons, and essentials using detailed, hands-on VR mechanics.

  • Physics-Based Combat: Engage in battles with bandits and wildlife, where every strike, block, and movement matters.

  • Base Building: Design and construct your own shelters or fortresses to protect against threats.

  • Exploration & Discovery: Traverse diverse islands, villages, and open landscapes full of secrets and resources.

  • Hunting & Fishing: Live off the land by hunting animals and fishing for food.

  • Dynamic Weather & Day/Night Cycle: Adapt to ever-changing environmental conditions that affect gameplay.

  • Bandits & Wildlife Encounters: Face roaming threats, from hostile humans to wild predators, in your fight for survival.

  • Community-Driven Development: Share ideas and shape the game’s future through discussions and feedback.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better

short_description: Falldenn is a medieval sandbox VR game developed by one person, focusing on realistic crafting and survival mechanics. Players can master various trades, while building a thriving empire. Navigate a dynamic economy, manage resources, and explore a beautifully immersive medieval world.
